name: Majespecter Unicorn - Kirin
effectText: (Quick Effect): You can target 1 Pendulum Monster in your Monster Zone and 1 monster your opponent controls; return them to the hand(s). You can only use this effect of "Majespecter Unicorn - Kirin" once per turn. While this card is in your Monster Zone, your opponent cannot target it with card effects, also it cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects.
